channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Electronics -- DOPSoft 2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Electronics -- DOPSoft 2

item.title: CVE-2021-38404|2024-08-04T01:37:16.563Z -- delta%20electronics -- dopsoft%202
item.description: Delta Electronic DOPSoft 2 (Version 2.00.07 and prior) lacks proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing specific project files. This could result in a heap-based buffer overflow. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2021-38406|2024-08-04T01:37:16.611Z -- delta%20electronics -- dopsoft%202
item.description: Delta Electronic DOPSoft 2 (Version 2.00.07 and prior) lacks proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing specific project files. This could result in multiple out-of-bounds write instances. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2021-38402|2024-08-04T01:37:16.542Z -- delta%20electronics -- dopsoft%202
item.description: Delta Electronic DOPSoft 2 (Version 2.00.07 and prior) lacks proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing specific project files. This could lead to a stack-based buffer overflow while trying to copy to a buffer during font string handling. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.
